original_text: David ruled over all Israel. He did everything that was right and fair for all his people.
korean_text: 다윗이 온 이스라엘을 다스려 다윗이 모든 백성에게 정의와 공의를 행할새

sentences.original_text: He did everything that was right
and fair for all his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 모든 백성에게 공정하게 대했다
